department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The 3rd Canadian Rangers Patrol Group requires a meeting room, parking for two buses, accommodations, and meals to support approximately 160 personnel attending the Junior Canadian Rangers National Marksmanship Competition
full_summary:
Title: Accommodations and Meals for Junior Canadian Rangers National Marksmanship Competition

**Tender Reference**
WS3945539110-Doc3945608540 - Amendment 1

**Solicitation Details**
* Solicitation Number: WS3945539110
* Publication Date: 2023-04-05
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2023-04-21T14:00:00 (EST)
* Amendment Date: 2023-04-12
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-05-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-06-30

**Tender Information**
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Requête de propositions)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Scope of Work**
The Third Canadian Rangers Patrol Group requires accommodations and meals to support approximately 160 personnel attending the Junior Canadian Rangers National Marksmanship Competition in St. Catharines, Ontario, Canada.

**Required Services**
* Meeting Room
* Parking for two (2) buses
* Accommodations
* Meals

**Bid Submission Requirements**
Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission on or before 2023-04-21T14:00:00 (EST). Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Important Details**
Ariba Discovery Public Posting: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15915747

**Contracting Entity Information**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Contact: Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: The Contact Phone Number and other contact information is not provided in the original text. If provided, it should be included. 

I took a few bullets out and rewrote them into simpler sentences. I also kept the most important info for this list as you may want to change the language based on your needs, and there could be aspects such as in-kind donations, priority items, notice Type and  Unrestricted bidding that may be very frequently interchanged. please review your needs and update the draft accordingly. - CC
